Kural_Info.Chapter: பெரியாரைத் துணைக்கோடல் (Seeking the Aid of Great Men)
Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பல்லார் பகைகொளலிற் பத்தடுத்த தீமைத்தே நல்லார் தொடர்கை விடல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: It is tenfold more injurious to abandon the friendship of the good, than to incur the hatred of the many.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A central figure, a ruler, is making a choice. On one side, a huge, angry mob of many people ('பல்லார் பகை') glares at him.
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the other side, a single, wise, and good friend ('நல்லார்') is being pushed away by the ruler. As the good friend is pushed away, a terrifying shadowy beast, ten times the size of the mob, emerges from the void created by the friend's departure. This beast represents the tenfold greater evil ('பத்தடுத்த தீமை').
Layered_Composition.Background: The ruler's kingdom is shown, threatened more by the giant shadow beast than by the angry mob.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A dramatic visualization that losing the friendship of one good person is ten times more harmful than making enemies of a multitude.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The angry mob represents 'the hatred of the many'. The giant shadow beast emerging from the absence of the good friend is the literal representation of the 'tenfold greater evil'.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Dramatic, cautionary, a terrible choice, profound loss.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The mob is lit with angry reds and oranges. The good friend has a gentle, calming aura. The shadow beast is a terrifying, light-absorbing black, casting a pall over the entire kingdom.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, dynamic shot that captures the ruler's choice and the immediate, monstrous consequence.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with creature design for the shadow beast.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, with the shadow beast creating the dominant mood of dread.

Cultural_Anchors: Losing a good friend ('நல்லார் தொடர்கை விடல்')
